title: Decades of Lying About Swedish Ancestry
summary: For decades, Trump claimed his grandfather came from Sweden. Both of Fred Trump's parents were actually German. Fred Trump lied about his ancestry due to anti-German sentiment. Trump perpetuated the family lie for years.
keyFacts: For decades claimed grandfather came from Sweden
Both of Fred Trump's parents were actually German
Fred Trump originally lied due to anti-German sentiment in early 20th century
Trump perpetuated the family lie throughout his business career
Eventually confirmed German ancestry was true
